name: Pintos - A simple operating system
info: Pintos is a simple OS framework for the 80x86 architecture. I implemented basic support for kernel threads, loading and running user programs, a file system, and virtual memory.

name: An Airplane Journey
info: An immersive web experience made with R3F and Drei. Explores 3D websites and Blender modeling skills. For someone special in my life. :)

name: Psetgroups
info: Built to help Stanford students find problem set groups for their classes. Creates optimal matches using using Edmonds' blossom algorithm.
